channel.title: Black Mesa Machinima: "Don't Forget Me".
channel.description:
I thought of this idea quite a while ago, and it was originally for a different mod, but I think it would work quite well with Black Mesa.
Here is the detail:
[align=center]![](upload://6I6PuuEmauXO02up6hgyYXrei26.jpeg)[/align]
"This machinima is set in Black Mesa, it follows the story of a scientist called Norman Van-Croft who has been filming vlogs of himself everyday, There is going to be 20 episodes, the first one is just before the Resonance Cascade happens.
All the episodes are going to be Vlog recordings, he will take you through the events happening at Black Mesa, all the way to surviving against the Xen creatures, and barricading his room from HECU enemies.
Coming Soon."
What do you guys think? I think it would be fun and simple to do, I'm going to have to lern2faceposer.
If anyone wants to take part, that would be great. :3

item.title: Black Mesa Machinima: "Don't Forget Me".
item.dc:creator: _amp_955_dam
item.description:
Script is being worked on with me and a guy at Facepunch.
(I know, I know, how could I possibly fall so low?)

No, seriously, there are some awesomely talented people down at Facepunch, I now have music composer, an animator, a script writer.

I still need a modeller and a mapper!

Spycrabz, feel free to speak to me on Steam.

Also, I have been doing another single episode Machinima that I have been keeping undercover for a while, but I want to mention it anyway. It’s called Somewhere in City 17, and it’s inspired by those I Am Legend Animated Comics. Since that’s only going to be one episode, It’s easy to get it done and show it.

I’m working on this one as well, both at the same time.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Machinima: "Don't Forget Me".
item.dc:creator: _amp_955_dam
item.description:
I could always do both, But I’d rather stick to the original idea first.

Hopefully though, now some plans have changed, I hope to have this out around the same time as Black Mesa, so this project is active now. When BM is released, if some episodes are done, they will be instantly uploaded to YT and dA, and the links will be here as well.

All I need, is someone to make a scientist model!

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Machinima: "Don't Forget Me".
item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
Honestly, I think it would be a better idea for him to be updating a vlog from a PDA, rather than from his dorm/office. Gives a better variety of locations and more for the main character to be doing.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Machinima: "Don't Forget Me".
item.dc:creator: Afroded
item.description:
It would be REALLY hard to make a convincing background set for a live action one though, though. Plus, probably expensive.

Anyways, I really like the idea… Though I’m thinking: Will it be like Andy’s video with a stationary camera (Moves it depending on where he goes, of course), will he be walking around with it, or both?

I also like the reference to Operation Lambda

EDIT: Actually, I just re-read one of your previous posts, which pretty much answers my question…

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Machinima: "Don't Forget Me".
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
Maybe have Norman really confused and frantic in the second episode, because he doesn’t work in sector C, and thus has no idea what’s going on.
In episode 3, he’s met up with an injured scientist from Sector C, and is explaining to the world what’s going on, perhaps with the scientist giving corrections every once in a while.
After all, each area is dealing with their own section of expertise, non-physists wouldn’t understand the nuances of a resonance cascade.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Machinima: "Don't Forget Me".
item.dc:creator: _amp_955_dam
item.description:
I’ve seen parts of that.

Yeah, that’s a good bit of footage as well, I’ve done research to see how people interact with these situations, as well as common sense.

Thanks for the link, it was good to watch it all the way through.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Machinima: "Don't Forget Me".
item.dc:creator: _amp_955_dam
item.description:
It’s similar to Cloverfield, I did get inspiration from that, but I mainly got inspiration from District 9. It’s just going to be a fixed place, his computer has a webcam and he films Vlogs of himself daily giving updates.

I like the Confidential part, Delta, maybe on the first episode I can have that.

He’s not going to interact with any main characters at all.

There’s only one reference to any other characters in the Unofficial Half Life world, and it’s one line mentioning that Dr. Alex Rhoza has disappeared. (Operation Lambda - HL2 Mod)

Read full topic
